name: Mattermost DevSecOps for Microsoft Teams
description: Access Mattermost DevSecOps directly within Microsoft Teams, with single sign-on using your Microsoft O365 account.

settings_schema.header: Embed Mattermost directly inside Microsoft 365, Teams, and Outlook clients. See [documentation](https://docs.mattermost.com/integrate/mattermost-mission-collaboration-for-m365.html) to learn more.

sections.title: Microsoft 365 Settings
sections.subtitle: These settings are used to configure the Microsoft 365 integration. You will need to register an application in Azure Portal and provide the client ID and secret here.

settings.help_text: The tenant ID of your Microsoft 365 organization. This is used to identify your organization in Microsoft 365.
The client ID of the application registered in Azure Portal. This is used to authenticate the application with Microsoft 365.
The client secret of the application registered in Azure Portal.
Disables notifications from Mattermost as activities in Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Manifest Settings
sections.subtitle: These settings are used to generate the Microsoft Teams app manifest which you will upload to your Microsoft Teams tenant.

settings.help_text: Increment this for each release to your organization's app store.

A unique identifier for the application generated by you in [Version 4 UUID format](https://www.uuidgenerator.net/). This is used to identify the application in Microsoft 365. Once set, do not change as you release new versions.
The name of the application as it will be displayed in your organization's app store.

To embed Mattermost within Microsoft Teams, an application manifest can be downloaded and installed as a MS Teams app. Clicking the Download button below will generate an application manifest that will embed this instance of Mattermost.
